title: March of the New Age

tokens.lyric: Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

lines.raw: [G]Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

tokens.lyric: God's will for all shall be
fulfilled;

lines.raw: [C]God's will for all shall be [G]fulfilled;

tokens.lyric: Teach to all men God's divine word,

lines.raw: [G]Teach to all men God's divine word,

tokens.lyric: Source of the Father's highest
truth

lines.raw: [C]Source of the Father's highest [G]truth

tokens.lyric: Wake the mighty land that remains asleep;

lines.raw: [C]Wake the mighty land that remains asleep;

tokens.lyric: Loudly ring the bell and proclaim to all;

lines.raw: [D]Loudly ring the bell and proclaim to all;

tokens.lyric: Fighting on till the day Satan falls in
defeat,

lines.raw: [G]Fighting on till the day Satan falls in [C]defeat,

tokens.lyric: I'll take the task on by myself.

lines.raw: [G]I'll take the task on by myself.

tokens.lyric: Share the persecution that Jesus
knew,

lines.raw: [G]Share the persecution that Jesus [C]knew,

tokens.lyric: Suffering abuse from the mocking
crowd.

lines.raw: [B7]Suffering abuse from the mocking [Am7]crowd.

lines.raw: [G]Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

tokens.lyric: God's will for all shall be
fulfilled;

lines.raw: [C]God's will for all shall be [G]fulfilled;

tokens.lyric: Teach to all men God's divine word,

lines.raw: [G]Teach to all men God's divine word,

tokens.lyric: Source of the Father's blessed
grace.

lines.raw: [C]Source of the Father's blessed [G]grace.

tokens.lyric: Two hundred million in darkness dwell;

lines.raw: [G]Two hundred million in darkness dwell;

tokens.lyric: Bring to the fire giving light to all;

lines.raw: [G]Bring to the fire giving light to all;

tokens.lyric: Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

lines.raw: [G]Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

tokens.lyric: I'll hold the burden by myself.

lines.raw: [G]I'll hold the burden by myself.

tokens.lyric: Share the heart of sadness that Jesus felt,

lines.raw: [G]Share the heart of sadness that Jesus felt,

tokens.lyric: Praying in the Garden alone with God.

lines.raw: [G]Praying in the Garden alone with God.

tokens.lyric: Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

lines.raw: [G]Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

tokens.lyric: God's will for all shall be
fulfilled;

lines.raw: [C]God's will for all shall be [G]fulfilled;

tokens.lyric: Teach to all men God's divine word,

lines.raw: [G]Teach to all men God's divine word,

tokens.lyric: Source of the Father's deepest
life.

lines.raw: [C]Source of the Father's deepest [G]life.

tokens.lyric: Tell the universe in the black of night;

lines.raw: [G]Tell the universe in the black of night;

tokens.lyric: Shout it with a strong voice awakening all;

lines.raw: [G]Shout it with a strong voice awakening all;

tokens.lyric: Fight on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

lines.raw: [G]Fight on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

tokens.lyric: I'll fight the battle by myself.

lines.raw: [G]I'll fight the battle by myself.

tokens.lyric: Take the cross and follow as Jesus did,

lines.raw: [G]Take the cross and follow as Jesus did,

tokens.lyric: Dying on the mountain at Calvary.

lines.raw: [G]Dying on the mountain at Calvary.

tokens.lyric: Win the whole world, heaven and earth,

tokens.lyric: God's will for all shall be
fulfilled;

lines.raw: [C]God's will for all shall be [G]fulfilled;

tokens.lyric: Teach to all men God's divine word,

lines.raw: [G]Teach to all men God's divine word,

tokens.lyric: Source of the Father's greatest
love.

lines.raw: [C]Source of the Father's greatest [G]love.

tokens.lyric: Tell the people trapped in a world of fear;

lines.raw: [G]Tell the people trapped in a world of fear;

tokens.lyric: Raising up the flag, we will free them all;

lines.raw: [G]Raising up the flag, we will free them all;

tokens.lyric: Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

lines.raw: [G]Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat,

tokens.lyric: I'll persevere now by myself.

lines.raw: [G]I'll persevere now by myself.

tokens.lyric: Let our Father rest from His lonely toil,

lines.raw: [G]Let our Father rest from His lonely toil,

tokens.lyric: History awaits us to do His will.

lines.raw: [G]History awaits us to do His will.
